message: Let's start with a fair split, 60-40 in my favor.
I think 70-30 is a more reasonable split.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. 45-55 is my best offer.
I'll meet you in the middle, 50-50, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 50-50 is still a bit too generous. I'll meet you halfway between my previous offer and the 50-50 split. 50.5-49.5 is my final offer.
